channel.title: Atomicity 317: VPS-hosted, Mac compatible, Quests, Skills, and Much More
channel.description:
[center][img]http://atomicity317.com/pictures/thingy.png[/img][/center]
[url=http://atomicity317.com/download/Atomicity%20Client.zip][img width=20 height=20]http://forums.zybez.net/uploads/av-313010.png[/img][/url][url=http://atomicity317.com/download/Atomicity%20Client.zip][b] Play Game (Download the Client)[/b][/url] [url=http://atomicity317.com/][img width=20 height=20]http://www.playgroundrecording.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/logo-web-300x300.png[/img][/url][url=http://atomicity317.com/][b] Visit Forums[/b][/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/atomicity317][img width=20 height=20]http://www.hudsonvalleyride.org/images/content/pagebuilder/youtube_icon.png[/img][b] Official YouTube Channel[/b][/url]
Atomicity is a server hosted on a dedicated owned by Kane and Ethan where we try to provide you with as much content as possible. All content (not the entire server, just content) was coded from scratch by the Atomicity Development Team, and has been worked on for over a year and a half. This server can be played on Mac or Windows, and was coded on a Mac. We are still developing the game, and always will be. We promise to frequently provide updates and listen to the suggestions of our players.
Please note that we aim to have a friendly, as well as helpful, staff team. Always feel free to talk to a staff member for help, or just to chat. We try to pick the best qualities for a staff member, whether it be a player mod or an admin. Do not ask us for any of these positions. We don't care if you've given new players 10k cash to get started every day, or if you report players regularly. We can see that stuff on our own without you bringing it up to us and asking for a staff position.
Some content that Atomicity provides: [b]Note: This does not list everything. For every tiny detail ever updated, click [url=http://atomicity317.com/updatelog.html]here[/url] for an entire update log since we first started developing the game.[/b]
[size=14pt]- A few core features[/size]
[ul][li]Runs on both Mac and Windows[/li] [li]Hosted on a 24/7 dedicated VPS to reduce lag and increase uptime![/li] [li]Website and forums hosted by a dedicated host[/li] [li]Walking to objects and NPCs before doing actions[/li] [li]Extremely safe player saving to ensure no resets[/li] [li]Detailed login verification system[/li][/ul]
[size=14pt]- Melee Combat[/size]
[ul][li]Player vs NPC combat (PvP is being worked on at the moment and will be released shortly)[/li] [li]Player and NPC max hits work correctly[/li] [li]All player bonuses function properly (attack bonuses and attack levels help to hit more often, strength bonuses and strength levels help to hit higher, and defence bonuses and defence levels help to get hit less often)[/li] [li]NPC drop tables (including rare drop table for NPCs that we choose to enable it for)[/li] [li]Working ring of wealth[/li] [li]Working NPC stats (defence, accuracy, max hits, health, etc.)[/li] [li]Special attacks for certain NPCs (ex: graardor, verac, guthan, chaos ele, dragonfire)[/li] [li]Dragons breathe fire occasionally and will burn you unless a dragonfire shield or anti-dragon shield is equipped[/li] [li]NPC combat emotes working (most of them have been added)[/li] [li]NPC following and retaliation[/li][/ul]
[size=14pt]- Prayer[/size]
[ul][li]Burying all bones[/li] [li]Using bones on altars for double exp (automatic process, use one bone and it does the rest for you one at a time)[/li] [li]Protect from melee[/li] [li]Protect from ranged[/li] [li]Ultimate strength[/li] [li]Incredible reflexes[/li] [li]Steel skin[/li] [li]Rapid heal[/li] [li]Prayer draining working (more prayers active = faster drain & faster drain for certain prayers)[/li] [li]Prayer bonus slows prayer drain[/li][/ul]
[size=14pt]- Home with some resources[/size]
[ul][li]General store (limited time offers for the first month or so that the game is released)[/li] [li]Bank[/li] [li]Ajjat (gives attack cape and teleports you to training area)[/li] [li]Wise Old Man (gives out quest cape and helmet of trails)[/li] [li]Ranged shop[/li] [li]Men to kill or pickpocket[/li] [li]Cook's assistant start[/li][/ul]
[img]http://atomicity317.com/pictures/A-home.png[/img]
[size=14pt]- Quests[/size]
[ul][li]Cooks assistant[/li] [li]Doric's quest[/li] [li]Ernest the chicken[/li] [li]Imp catcher[/li] [li]The restless ghost[/li] [li]Rune mysteries[/li] [li]Sheep shearer[/li] [li]Quest cape can be purchased when all quest points are earned[/li] [li]More free quests, some member quests, and custom quests will be added in the future[/li][/ul]
[img]http://atomicity317.com/pictures/B-quests.png[/img] [img]http://atomicity317.com/pictures/C-quest cape.png[/img]
[size=14pt]- Skill guides[/size]
[ul][li]Hand-coded from scratch[/li] [li]Will be updated to include all information[/li][/ul]
[img]http://atomicity317.com/pictures/D-skill guides.png[/img]
[size=14pt]- Training area and music unlocking[/size]
[ul][li]Variety of monsters to train from[/li] [li]All monsters can be assigned as a Slayer task[/li] [li]Music tracks unlock via an area database[/li][/ul]
[img]http://atomicity317.com/pictures/E-training and music.png[/img]
[size=14pt]- Wide variety of Slayer tasks[/size]
[ul][li]Use amulet of glory to get to Edgeville, then go into trapdoor to find Vannaka[/li] [li]Slayer gem works to show how you're doing on your current task[/li] [li]Talk to Vannaka at any time to change your task[/li] [li]Slayer requirements for attacking certain monsters[/li][/ul]
[img]http://atomicity317.com/pictures/F-slayer.png[/img]
[size=14pt]- Barrows[/size]
[ul][li]Actual barrows minigame (not the crap one where all the brothers spawn on the hills and they drop their equipment)[/li] [li]Verac effect (npc and armor set)[/li] [li]Guthan effect (npc and armor set)[/li] [li]Dharok effect coming soon[/li][/ul]
[img]http://atomicity317.com/pictures/G-barrows.png[/img]
[size=14pt]- Hand-coded range system[/size]
[ul][li]Equip requirements[/li] [li]Arrow/bolt requirements[/li] [li]Crystal bow works without arrows[/li] [li]Better arrows give better accuracy and damage[/li] [li]Dark bow[/li] [li]Accumulator works[/li] [li]Limits on how far you can attack from[/li] [li]Crossbows and bolts[/li] [li]Enchanted bolts coming soon[/li][/ul]
[img]http://atomicity317.com/pictures/H-bow.png[/img] [img]http://atomicity317.com/pictures/I-cbow.png[/img] [img]http://atomicity317.com/pictures/J-crystal bow.png[/img] [img]http://atomicity317.com/pictures/K-dark bow.png[/img]
[size=14pt]- Skills[/size]
[ul][li]All skills are coded from scratch[/li] [li]Actions that should be automatic are made automatic (ex: cutting gems)[/li] [li]25x XP Rate[/li][/ul]
[size=14pt]- Mining[/size]
[ul][li]All ores working[/li] [li]Better pickaxes mine faster[/li] [li]Rocks deplete[/li] [li]Higher level ores take longer to mine[/li] [li]Based on cycles rather than timers (Normally, the rocks would just be given higher timers for each ore, and when the timer runs out, the ore is collected. The correct way is with cycles, where higher level ores are given a lower chance of successfully mining an ore, and every half-second, the server checks to see if the ore should be mined. If this chance to mine is hit, the ore is collected and the process stops)[/li] [li]Chance to mine gems[/li][/ul]
[img]http://atomicity317.com/pictures/L-mining.png[/img]
[size=14pt]- Agility[/size]
[ul][li]Barbarian and Gnome course[/li] [li]Chance of failure[/li] [li]Wilderness course and others coming soon[/li][/ul]
[img]http://atomicity317.com/pictures/M-agility.png[/img]
[size=14pt]- Herblore[/size]
[ul][li]Unidentified herbs[/li] [li]Un-id'd herbs have their item ID's removed when right clicking them on the client[/li] [li]All unfinished potions can be made[/li] [li]All potions can be made[/li][/ul]
[img]http://atomicity317.com/pictures/N-herblore.png[/img]
[size=14pt]- Fishing[/size]
[ul][li]All net fishing fish[/li] [li]All bait fishing fish[/li] [li]All big-net fishing fish (including seaweed, caskets, etc.)[/li] [li]Lobster caging[/li] [li]All harpoon fishing fish[/li] [li]Deep-sea fishing for rocktail and cavefish[/li] [li]Fishing guild[/li] [li]Cycling system (see mining)[/li][/ul]
[img]http://atomicity317.com/pictures/O-fishing1.png[/img] [img]http://atomicity317.com/pictures/P-fishing2.png[/img]
[size=14pt]- Cooking[/size]
[ul][li]All fish, bread, and meat work[/li] [li]Making bread dough[/li] [li]Chance to burn food (decreases with cooking level increase)[/li] [li]Set levels to stop burning food[/li] [li]Ranges lower burn chance[/li] [li]Can be cooked on fire or range[/li] [li]Cooking gauntlets lower chance to burn and lower level to stop burning[/li][/ul]
[img]http://atomicity317.com/pictures/Q-cooking.png[/img]
[size=14pt]- Thieving[/size]
[ul][li]Pickpocketing (men, women, farmers, warriors, guards, master farmer, knights, paladins, heroes, elves[/li] [li]NPCs give a wide variety of loot which gets better the higher level you need[/li] [li]All NPCs have a rare chance to get a set valuable item when pickpocketing[/li] [li]Master farmer gives unidentified herbs[/li] [li]Chance to fail and be stunned, as well as hit for specified damage[/li][/ul]
[img]http://atomicity317.com/pictures/R-thieving.png[/img]
[size=14pt]- Crafting[/size]
[ul][li]Pottery[/li] [li]Making soft clay[/li] [li]Cutting gems[/li] [li]Making dragonhide armor[/li] [li]Tanning hides[/li] [li]Spinning flax, wool, and magic roots[/li][/ul]
[img]http://atomicity317.com/pictures/S-crafting1.png[/img] [img]http://atomicity317.com/pictures/T-crafting2.png[/img] [img]http://atomicity317.com/pictures/U-crafting3.png[/img] [img]http://atomicity317.com/pictures/V-crafting4.png[/img] [img]http://atomicity317.com/pictures/W-crafting5.png[/img] [img]http://atomicity317.com/pictures/X-crafting6.png[/img] [img]http://atomicity317.com/pictures/Y-crafting7.png[/img] [img]http://atomicity317.com/pictures/Z-crafting8.png[/img] [img]http://atomicity317.com/pictures/27-crafting9.png[/img]
[size=14pt]- Woodcutting and firemaking[/size]
[ul][li]All correct trees added[/li] [li]Added magic logs model to client so they don't look like willow logs[/li] [li]Correct axe identification (sever finds the best axe that you can use between your equipped axe and any inventory axes and uses it)[/li] [li]Cycling system (see mining)[/li] [li]Lighting requirements for firemaking[/li][/ul]
[img]http://atomicity317.com/pictures/28-woodcutting.png[/img] [img]http://atomicity317.com/pictures/29-woodcutting2.png[/img]
[size=14pt]- Chaos Elemental[/size]
[ul][li]Most difficult boss at the moment[/li] [li]Ring of dueling to get there[/li] [li]Casts 4 different spells in addition to regular combat (healing spell, very powerful spell, removes weapon, and teleports you away when it's at low HP)[/li] [li]Valuable drops (dragon 2h, amulet of fury (im))[/li] [li]High defense and accuracy[/li][/ul]
[img]http://atomicity317.com/pictures/30-chaosele.png[/img] [img]http://atomicity317.com/pictures/31-chaosdrops.png[/img]
[size=14pt]- TzHaar[/size]
[ul][li]Games necklace to get there[/li] [li]All NPCs added with appropriate stats[/li] [li]All NPCs drop their proper obsidian items[/li][/ul]
[img]http://atomicity317.com/pictures/32-tzhaar.png[/img]
[size=14pt]- Giant mole[/size]
[ul][li]Dig in the holes in Falador garden to access[/li] [li]Drops some valuable items, including helm of neitiznot[/li][/ul]
[img]http://atomicity317.com/pictures/33-giantmole.png[/img]
[size=14pt]- Warrior's Guild[/size]
[ul][li]Attack+Strength must be 120 to enter[/li] [li]Cyclopses rarely drop defenders[/li] [li]Once one defender is dropped, the next tier will be dropped the next time[/li] [li]Defenders up to barrows[/li][/ul]
[img]http://atomicity317.com/pictures/34-warriorguild.png[/img]
[size=14pt]- Godwars[/size]
[ul][li]Only Bandos at the moment, although other generals are added in client[/li] [li]Orcs count as 1 bandos kill[/li] [li]Orcs have rare chance to drop dragon boots[/li] [li]40 Bandos kill count required to access general (drained upon entrance)[/li] [li]General Graardor with appropriate stats (may be buffed in the future)[/li] [li]Bandos armor drops[/li] [li]Bandos hilt and godsword blade drops[/li] [li]3 Bandos kills per Graardor kill[/li] [li]Godsword assembling and disassembling (with warning message for disassembling)[/li][/ul]
[img]http://atomicity317.com/pictures/35-gwd1.png[/img] [img]http://atomicity317.com/pictures/36-gwd2.png[/img] [img]http://atomicity317.com/pictures/37-gwd3.png[/img] [img]http://atomicity317.com/pictures/38-gwd4.png[/img]
[size=14pt]- Slayer Tower[/size]
[ul][li]Filled with slayer monsters[/li] [li]Slayer monsters require slayer gear (need to add the rest)[/li] [li]Slayer monsters drop slayer items (ex: abyssal demon drops whip)[/li][/ul]
[img]http://atomicity317.com/pictures/40-stower1.png[/img] [img]http://atomicity317.com/pictures/41-stower2.png[/img] [img]http://atomicity317.com/pictures/42-stower3.png[/img] [img]http://atomicity317.com/pictures/43-stower4.png[/img] [img]http://atomicity317.com/pictures/44-stower5.png[/img]
Thank you for taking the time to look at our content! Please leave us some feedback, and please come try out our server! We're excited to start meeting new players.
- Kane and [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=567276]Ethan[/url], founders of Atomicity

item.title: Atomicity 317: VPS-hosted, Mac compatible, Quests, Skills, and Much More
item.dc:creator: @_Kane † Kane †
item.description:
@_Kane wrote:

[center][/center]

Play Game (Download the Client)
Visit Forums
Official YouTube Channel

Atomicity is a server hosted on a dedicated owned by Kane and Ethan where we try to provide you with as much content as possible. All content (not the entire server, just content) was coded from scratch by the Atomicity Development Team, and has been worked on for over a year and a half. This server can be played on Mac or Windows, and was coded on a Mac. We are still developing the game, and always will be. We promise to frequently provide updates and listen to the suggestions of our players.

Please note that we aim to have a friendly, as well as helpful, staff team. Always feel free to talk to a staff member for help, or just to chat. We try to pick the best qualities for a staff member, whether it be a player mod or an admin. Do not ask us for any of these positions. We don’t care if you’ve given new players 10k cash to get started every day, or if you report players regularly. We can see that stuff on our own without you bringing it up to us and asking for a staff position.

Some content that Atomicity provides:
Note: This does not list everything. For every tiny detail ever updated, click here for an entire update log since we first started developing the game.

[size=14pt]- A few core features[/size]

[ul][li]Runs on both Mac and Windows[/li]
[li]Hosted on a 24/7 dedicated VPS to reduce lag and increase uptime![/li]
[li]Website and forums hosted by a dedicated host[/li]
[li]Walking to objects and NPCs before doing actions[/li]
[li]Extremely safe player saving to ensure no resets[/li]
[li]Detailed login verification system[/li][/ul]

[size=14pt]- Melee Combat[/size]

[ul][li]Player vs NPC combat (PvP is being worked on at the moment and will be released shortly)[/li]
[li]Player and NPC max hits work correctly[/li]
[li]All player bonuses function properly (attack bonuses and attack levels help to hit more often, strength bonuses and strength levels help to hit higher, and defence bonuses and defence levels help to get hit less often)[/li]
[li]NPC drop tables (including rare drop table for NPCs that we choose to enable it for)[/li]
[li]Working ring of wealth[/li]
[li]Working NPC stats (defence, accuracy, max hits, health, etc.)[/li]
[li]Special attacks for certain NPCs (ex: graardor, verac, guthan, chaos ele, dragonfire)[/li]
[li]Dragons breathe fire occasionally and will burn you unless a dragonfire shield or anti-dragon shield is equipped[/li]
[li]NPC combat emotes working (most of them have been added)[/li]
[li]NPC following and retaliation[/li][/ul]

[size=14pt]- Prayer[/size]

[ul][li]Burying all bones[/li]
[li]Using bones on altars for double exp (automatic process, use one bone and it does the rest for you one at a time)[/li]
[li]Protect from melee[/li]
[li]Protect from ranged[/li]
[li]Ultimate strength[/li]
[li]Incredible reflexes[/li]
[li]Steel skin[/li]
[li]Rapid heal[/li]
[li]Prayer draining working (more prayers active = faster drain & faster drain for certain prayers)[/li]
[li]Prayer bonus slows prayer drain[/li][/ul]

[size=14pt]- Home with some resources[/size]

[ul][li]General store (limited time offers for the first month or so that the game is released)[/li]
[li]Bank[/li]
[li]Ajjat (gives attack cape and teleports you to training area)[/li]
[li]Wise Old Man (gives out quest cape and helmet of trails)[/li]
[li]Ranged shop[/li]
[li]Men to kill or pickpocket[/li]
[li]Cook’s assistant start[/li][/ul]

[size=14pt]- Quests[/size]

[ul][li]Cooks assistant[/li]
[li]Doric’s quest[/li]
[li]Ernest the chicken[/li]
[li]Imp catcher[/li]
[li]The restless ghost[/li]
[li]Rune mysteries[/li]
[li]Sheep shearer[/li]
[li]Quest cape can be purchased when all quest points are earned[/li]
[li]More free quests, some member quests, and custom quests will be added in the future[/li][/ul]


[size=14pt]- Skill guides[/size]

[ul][li]Hand-coded from scratch[/li]
[li]Will be updated to include all information[/li][/ul]

[size=14pt]- Training area and music unlocking[/size]

[ul][li]Variety of monsters to train from[/li]
[li]All monsters can be assigned as a Slayer task[/li]
[li]Music tracks unlock via an area database[/li][/ul]

[size=14pt]- Wide variety of Slayer tasks[/size]

[ul][li]Use amulet of glory to get to Edgeville, then go into trapdoor to find Vannaka[/li]
[li]Slayer gem works to show how you’re doing on your current task[/li]
[li]Talk to Vannaka at any time to change your task[/li]
[li]Slayer requirements for attacking certain monsters[/li][/ul]

[size=14pt]- Barrows[/size]

[ul][li]Actual barrows minigame (not the crap one where all the brothers spawn on the hills and they drop their equipment)[/li]
[li]Verac effect (npc and armor set)[/li]
[li]Guthan effect (npc and armor set)[/li]
[li]Dharok effect coming soon[/li][/ul]

[size=14pt]- Hand-coded range system[/size]

[ul][li]Equip requirements[/li]
[li]Arrow/bolt requirements[/li]
[li]Crystal bow works without arrows[/li]
[li]Better arrows give better accuracy and damage[/li]
[li]Dark bow[/li]
[li]Accumulator works[/li]
[li]Limits on how far you can attack from[/li]
[li]Crossbows and bolts[/li]
[li]Enchanted bolts coming soon[/li][/ul]




[size=14pt]- Skills[/size]

[ul][li]All skills are coded from scratch[/li]
[li]Actions that should be automatic are made automatic (ex: cutting gems)[/li]
[li]25x XP Rate[/li][/ul]

[size=14pt]- Mining[/size]

[ul][li]All ores working[/li]
[li]Better pickaxes mine faster[/li]
[li]Rocks deplete[/li]
[li]Higher level ores take longer to mine[/li]
[li]Based on cycles rather than timers (Normally, the rocks would just be given higher timers for each ore, and when the timer runs out, the ore is collected. The correct way is with cycles, where higher level ores are given a lower chance of successfully mining an ore, and every half-second, the server checks to see if the ore should be mined. If this chance to mine is hit, the ore is collected and the process stops)[/li]
[li]Chance to mine gems[/li][/ul]

[size=14pt]- Agility[/size]

[ul][li]Barbarian and Gnome course[/li]
[li]Chance of failure[/li]
[li]Wilderness course and others coming soon[/li][/ul]

[size=14pt]- Herblore[/size]

[ul][li]Unidentified herbs[/li]
[li]Un-id’d herbs have their item ID’s removed when right clicking them on the client[/li]
[li]All unfinished potions can be made[/li]
[li]All potions can be made[/li][/ul]

[size=14pt]- Fishing[/size]

[ul][li]All net fishing fish[/li]
[li]All bait fishing fish[/li]
[li]All big-net fishing fish (including seaweed, caskets, etc.)[/li]
[li]Lobster caging[/li]
[li]All harpoon fishing fish[/li]
[li]Deep-sea fishing for rocktail and cavefish[/li]
[li]Fishing guild[/li]
[li]Cycling system (see mining)[/li][/ul]


[size=14pt]- Cooking[/size]

[ul][li]All fish, bread, and meat work[/li]
[li]Making bread dough[/li]
[li]Chance to burn food (decreases with cooking level increase)[/li]
[li]Set levels to stop burning food[/li]
[li]Ranges lower burn chance[/li]
[li]Can be cooked on fire or range[/li]
[li]Cooking gauntlets lower chance to burn and lower level to stop burning[/li][/ul]

[size=14pt]- Thieving[/size]

[ul][li]Pickpocketing (men, women, farmers, warriors, guards, master farmer, knights, paladins, heroes, elves[/li]
[li]NPCs give a wide variety of loot which gets better the higher level you need[/li]
[li]All NPCs have a rare chance to get a set valuable item when pickpocketing[/li]
[li]Master farmer gives unidentified herbs[/li]
[li]Chance to fail and be stunned, as well as hit for specified damage[/li][/ul]

[size=14pt]- Crafting[/size]

[ul][li]Pottery[/li]
[li]Making soft clay[/li]
[li]Cutting gems[/li]
[li]Making dragonhide armor[/li]
[li]Tanning hides[/li]
[li]Spinning flax, wool, and magic roots[/li][/ul]









[size=14pt]- Woodcutting and firemaking[/size]

[ul][li]All correct trees added[/li]
[li]Added magic logs model to client so they don’t look like willow logs[/li]
[li]Correct axe identification (sever finds the best axe that you can use between your equipped axe and any inventory axes and uses it)[/li]
[li]Cycling system (see mining)[/li]
[li]Lighting requirements for firemaking[/li][/ul]


[size=14pt]- Chaos Elemental[/size]

[ul][li]Most difficult boss at the moment[/li]
[li]Ring of dueling to get there[/li]
[li]Casts 4 different spells in addition to regular combat (healing spell, very powerful spell, removes weapon, and teleports you away when it’s at low HP)[/li]
[li]Valuable drops (dragon 2h, amulet of fury (im))[/li]
[li]High defense and accuracy[/li][/ul]


[size=14pt]- TzHaar[/size]

[ul][li]Games necklace to get there[/li]
[li]All NPCs added with appropriate stats[/li]
[li]All NPCs drop their proper obsidian items[/li][/ul]

[size=14pt]- Giant mole[/size]

[ul][li]Dig in the holes in Falador garden to access[/li]
[li]Drops some valuable items, including helm of neitiznot[/li][/ul]

[size=14pt]- Warrior’s Guild[/size]

[ul][li]Attack+Strength must be 120 to enter[/li]
[li]Cyclopses rarely drop defenders[/li]
[li]Once one defender is dropped, the next tier will be dropped the next time[/li]
[li]Defenders up to barrows[/li][/ul]

[size=14pt]- Godwars[/size]

[ul][li]Only Bandos at the moment, although other generals are added in client[/li]
[li]Orcs count as 1 bandos kill[/li]
[li]Orcs have rare chance to drop dragon boots[/li]
[li]40 Bandos kill count required to access general (drained upon entrance)[/li]
[li]General Graardor with appropriate stats (may be buffed in the future)[/li]
[li]Bandos armor drops[/li]
[li]Bandos hilt and godsword blade drops[/li]
[li]3 Bandos kills per Graardor kill[/li]
[li]Godsword assembling and disassembling (with warning message for disassembling)[/li][/ul]




[size=14pt]- Slayer Tower[/size]

[ul][li]Filled with slayer monsters[/li]
[li]Slayer monsters require slayer gear (need to add the rest)[/li]
[li]Slayer monsters drop slayer items (ex: abyssal demon drops whip)[/li][/ul]





Thank you for taking the time to look at our content! Please leave us some feedback, and please come try out our server! We’re excited to start meeting new players.

  • Kane and Ethan, founders of Atomicity

Read full topic
item.source: Atomicity 317: VPS-hosted, Mac compatible, Quests, Skills, and Much More
